channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 美国众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）将提前到11月的选举中决定谁将填补已故黛安-范斯坦（Dianne Feinstein）担任了三十年之久的美国参议员席位。
item.description:
U.S. Rep. Adam Schiff is advancing to a November election to decide who will fill the U.S. Senate seat held for three decades by the late Dianne Feinstein. https://t.co/aC1m6goCQ7

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 德克萨斯州受野火重创城市的消防队长在扑救房屋火灾时丧生
item.description:
Fire chief in Texas city hit hard by wildfires dies while fighting a house fire https://t.co/pLsRm1mjVr

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在加利福尼亚州总统初选中赢得 "超级星期二 "最大奖项。
item.description:
Joe Biden and Donald Trump win biggest Super Tuesday prize in California presidential primaries. https://t.co/U2lIiiqzEp

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一座新的大屠杀博物馆展示了四分之三的荷兰犹太人是如何被驱逐和杀害的
item.description:
A new Holocaust Museum shows how three-quarters of Dutch Jews were deported and killed https://t.co/0ycWySRfmL

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）在佛蒙特州的 "超级星期二 "初选中赢得了第二场胜利，尽管她在其他地方输给了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）。
item.description:
BREAKING: Nikki Haley takes her second primary win, grabbing a Super Tuesday victory in Vermont despite losing elsewhere to Donald Trump. https://t.co/bSi7zQwvaG

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 大满贯冠军西蒙娜-哈勒普（Simona Halep）赢得兴奋剂案上诉，获准恢复网球运动
item.description:
Grand Slam champ Simona Halep wins doping case on appeal and is cleared to resume tennis https://t.co/jmf4NcQCuW

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统在 "超级星期二 "席卷了民主党的所有竞选活动--除了美属萨摩亚。他在那里输给了一位以前名不见经传的候选人杰森-帕尔默（Jason Palmer）。
item.description:
President Joe Biden was sweeping every Democratic contest on Super Tuesday — except for American Samoa. He fell short there to a previously unknown candidate named Jason Palmer. https://t.co/KBYZd3QLRf

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院法官萨拉-斯图尔特（Sarah Stewart）是裁定冷冻胚胎根据州法律被视为儿童的法院多数成员之一，她赢得了共和党对阿拉巴马州首席大法官的提名。
item.description:
Alabama Supreme Court Justice Sarah Stewart, who was part of a court majority that ruled frozen embryos are considered children under a state law, has won the Republican nomination for Alabama chief justice. https://t.co/GRgGh8P1wr

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 标志性的老西部风滚草滚滚而来，覆盖了盐湖城郊区的部分地区
item.description:
Iconic Old West tumbleweeds roll in and blanket parts of suburban Salt Lake City https://t.co/n8O2nR7WH9

item.title: 乔-拜登总统和前总统唐纳德-特朗普是再次赢得各自党派连任提名的压倒性热门人选。但他们还不是 "推定提名人"。
item.description:
President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump are the overwhelming favorites to once again win their parties’ nomination for a second term. But they’re not the “presumptive nominees” just yet. https://t.co/zagqZ5OHp2

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 特朗普在最高法院获胜的启示：他继续留在选票上，但他的法律危险才刚刚开始
item.description:
Takeaways from Trump's Supreme Court win: He stays on ballot, but his legal peril is just starting https://t.co/FpiHhCOLIu

item.title: 最新消息：美国总统拜登（Joe Biden）和前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二 "赢得了全国各地的胜利，几乎确定了大选复赛的结果。拜登赢得了 12 个州，特朗普赢得了 10 个州。
item.description:
BREAKING: President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump rack up Super Tuesday wins around the country, all but cementing a general election rematch. Biden has won 12 states and Trump 10. https://t.co/BFqzT9D5S3

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 院子里发现放射性污染后，圣路易斯县小溪附近的住宅正在接受检测
item.description:
Homes near St. Louis County creek are being tested after radioactive contamination found in yards https://t.co/jrlJpdYdzZ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 国际汽联确认举报人就沙特阿拉伯和拉斯维加斯赛事对主席提出投诉
item.description:
FIA confirms whistleblower complaints against president regarding Saudi Arabia and Las Vegas races https://t.co/XFX3wiDEqq

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 共和党副州长马克-罗宾逊（Mark Robinson）和民主党总检察长乔希-斯坦恩（Josh Stein）在北卡罗来纳州初选中赢得提名，以接替任期届满的民主党州长罗伊-库珀（Roy Cooper）。
item.description:
BREAKING: Republican Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson and Democratic Attorney General Josh Stein have won the nominations in the North Carolina primary election to replace term-limited Democratic Gov. Roy Cooper. https://t.co/fDX3bo4w7V

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统和前总统唐纳德-特朗普已经开始赢得早期的胜利，使他们离11月的复赛越来越近。两人都在弗吉尼亚州和北卡罗来纳州获胜，拜登还在佛蒙特州和爱荷华州获胜。
item.description:
President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump have begun racking up early wins moving them closer to a November rematch. Both men won in Virginia and North Carolina and Biden also won in Vermont and Iowa. https://t.co/OUuKCUaCpz

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 北加州一家滑雪度假村的工作人员打开办公楼二层的一扇门，发现里面是一堵坚固的雪墙。该度假村位于 7000 英尺高的山区，是周四开始肆虐该地区的暴风雪中降雪量最大的地方。
item.description:
Staff at a Northern California ski resort opened a door on the second level of their office building to find a solid wall of snow. The resort is 7,000 feet high in the mountains and recorded the highest amounts of snow from the storm that began barreling into the region Thursday. pic.twitter.com/TSbbnhHj9M

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯间谍局长称反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼死于自然原因
item.description:
Russian spymaster said opposition leader Alexei Navalny died of natural causes https://t.co/7KpVK34grU

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美联社记者梅格-金纳德（Meg Kinnard）将在 "超级星期二 "为选民投票，敬请收看我们的海岸直播报道。
item.description:
Join us for coast-to-coast live coverage with AP's Meg Kinnard as voters cast their ballots on Super Tuesday. https://t.co/kDOcFI09hT

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 现在开始：随着初选活动最重要的一晚的展开，东海岸的第一批投票站即将关闭。请关注美联社的最新现场报道。

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 继美联航和美国航空采取类似举措后，达美航空也将托运行李费上调 17%。

Delta Airlines is hiking checked-baggage fees 17% following similar moves by United and American https://t.co/EpnV9gswCf

item.title: 从阿拉斯加州、加利福尼亚州到佛蒙特州和弗吉尼亚州，16 个州和 1 个地区正在举行 "超级星期二 "选举。数百名代表岌岌可危，这是任何一个党派在任何一天的最大收获。
item.description:
Super Tuesday elections are being held in 16 states and one territory — from Alaska and California to Vermont and Virginia. Hundreds of delegates are at stake, the biggest haul for either party on any single day.

Here's what to know. https://t.co/u0HJPnnWBQ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）面临从特朗普案中撤职之际，佐治亚州推动组织制裁检察官
item.description:
Georgia pushes group to sanction prosecutors as Fani Willis faces removal from Trump case https://t.co/Vki1lNj8VD

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）赢得了爱荷华州的民主党总统提名竞选。美联社将报道 "超级星期二"，16 个州和一个地区的选民将前往投票站投票。最新消息
item.description:
Joe Biden has won the Democratic presidential nominating contest in Iowa.

Follow AP's Super Tuesday coverage as voters head to the polls in 16 states and one territory. The latest: https://t.co/fxC1MXVN4e

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 5, 2024
